it.unibz.krdb.obda.owlrefplatform.questdb

Class QuestDBVirtualStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibz.krdb.obda.owlrefplatform.questdb.QuestDBAbstractStore
      • it.unibz.krdb.obda.owlrefplatform.questdb.QuestDBVirtualStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class QuestDBVirtualStore
extends QuestDBAbstractStore
    A bean that holds all the data about a store, generates a store folder and maintains this data.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • QuestDBVirtualStore

        public QuestDBVirtualStore(String name,
                           URI tboxFile,
                           URI obdaUri,
                           QuestPreferences config,
                           ImplicitDBConstraintsReader userConstraints)
                    throws Exception
        The constructor to setup Quest virtual store given an owl file URI and an obda or R2rml mapping file URI
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of the triple store
        tboxFile - - the owl file URI
        obdaUri - - the obda or ttl file URI
        config - - QuestPreferences
        userConstraints - - User-supplied database constraints (or null)
        Throws:
        Exception

        public void initialize()
                throws Exception
